description: Joins two datatables based on a common column between them.

input.name: main column
input.description: The name of the column in the `main data` that is used to join rows of `other data`.

input.name: other data
input.description: The other datatable to be joined.

input.name: other column
input.description:
The name the column in the `other data` on that is used to join rows of `main data`.
If unassigned, the value of `main column` will be used.

input.name: inner join
input.description:
Specifies whether to include rows that have matching values in both tables.
Defaults to `False`.

input.name: columns
input.description:
Specifies which columns of `other data` to include.
If unassigned, all columns in `other data` will be included.

input.name: overwrite
input.description:
Specifies whether to overwrite columns which exist in both tables.
Defaults to `False`.

input.name: distance
input.description:
Specifies whether to use fuzzy matching when joining the rows.
Defaults to `100` (full match).

output.name: data
output.description: A new datatable containing joined rows and columns.

output.name: skipped
output.description: A datatable containing rows which have not been joined.
